Package org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.controller

This package contains bean classes used by the active bpel WAR.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeBpelBandedContainerController Base controller for creating banded figures.
AeBpelChoiceContainerController Controller which creates and returns ChoiceContainerFigure as the content.
AeBpelChoicePartController Controller responsible for creating choice part figures such as Case, Otherwise, OnMessage, OnAlarm, Catch and CatchAll.
AeBpelContainerActivityController The AeBpelContainerActivityController creates and returns figure that will be used for container type activies such as Flow, While.
AeBpelContainerController Base controller for BPEL container type definitions.
AeBpelContainerImplicitActivityController Controller which is responsible for creating implicit activity containers.
AeBpelControllerBase Base controller for all BPEL definitions.
AeBpelControllerFactory Factory responsible for creating controllers given the BPEL model.
AeBpelIfElseActivityController The AeBpelIfElseActivityController creates "container" figure for the if-elseif-else parts.
AeBpelLinkController Controller which creates a link figure.
AeBpelMockController A simple controller used for testing.
AeBpelPickActivityController Controller tagged for BPEL Pick type activities.
AeBpelProcessRootController Controller which is the root controller for the BPEL process.
AeBpelScopeActivityController The AeBpelScopeActivityController reorders the child models so that the Activity type objects appear at the top of the model's child list.
AeBpelSequenceActivityController The AeBpelSequenceActivityController creates AeSequenceContainerFigure figure.
AeBpelSimpleActivityController Controller responsible for creating AeBpelSimpleActivityFigure.
AeBpelSwitchActivityController The AeBpelSwitchActivityController creates figure to Switch type activities.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.bpel.controller Description

This package contains bean classes used by the active bpel WAR.
